attributes.review: I had just gotten the app, i wanted to keep up with everything our favorite orange was doing.  Suddenly while i was sitting in my living room i heard a knock on my window.  SUDDENLY TRUMP BURST IN!!!!! I WOULD NOT RECOMEND! HE STOLE ALL OF MY STUFF.  I LIVE IN AN EMPTY HOUSE KNOW. HE EVEN TOOK MY DOG! WHAT KIND OF MONSTER TAKES A DOG??? HIS NAME WAS SPOT THE THIRD AND I LOVED HIM.
attributes.title: No
